attributes.action: Parliment to have an emergency debate on halting illegal immigration
attributes.additional_details: The country is a small island and we simply cannot fund the influx of immigrants without causing hardship to our own people.
attributes.background: I want the Government to have an emergency debate on immigration and to consider suspending immigration which includes allowing family members the right to live in the UK and deploying the Royal Navy to prevent illegal immigration until a sensible strategy is implemented.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action:

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
